Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Koala Sanctuary Port Stephens, One Mile 177519 © Destination NSW Koala Sanctuary Port Stephens, One Mile 177522 © Destination NSW 4WD R US, Port Stephens 187828 © Destination NSW Mount Tomaree, Port Stephens 149350 © Destination NSW New South Wales 4 Day Port Stephens & Koala Sanctuary Adventure 3 Nights • Car Hire • Sightseeing Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Set in 8 hectares of stunning bushland and nestled on the edge of the magnificent One Mile Beach and Worimi Conservation Lands sand dunes, Port Stephens Koala Sanctuary offers the best of both worlds. Be close enough to experience the abundance of sights and activities Port Stephens has to offer, yet secluded enough to enjoy the native bird and animal life which have made their homes in the surrounding wetlands. The Deluxe 4 Star Glamping tents offer you the perfect place to rejuvenate while enjoying a unique nocturnal experience. Wake up with the koalas in their spectacular natural bushland setting and enjoy everything that the Koala Sanctuary has to offer. View more View less 3 nights + car hire & sightseeing from $ 989 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : Until 30 September 25 by 4pm or unless sold out prior Your inclusions 3 Nights at Port Stephens Koala Sanctuary in a Superior Glamping Tent including; Welcome Hamper on Arrival, Continental Breakfast ingredients Unlimited Entry into Port Stephens Koala Sanctuary & guided Walk and Talk tour & morning Koala Viewing 4 Day car hire in a Toyota Corolla or Similar (Kia Sportage or Similar for family package) - Pick up /drop off Sydney Airport 4 Day Port Stephens Adventure From $989 per person share twin Travel: 15 Jun-23 Sep, 13 Oct-16 Dec 25 & 01 Feb-21 Mar 26 From $2539 per family (based on 2 AD/2 CH (4-13 yrs) Travel: 15 Jun-23 Sep, 13 Oct-16 Dec 25 & 01 Feb-21 Mar 26 Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings to 30 September 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 26 May 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Valid for departures as specified. Blackout dates and surcharges may apply over special events, public holidays, and holiday periods. Inclusions are subject to change based on supplier operational capabilities. International & Domestic flights and transfers not included • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Payment schedule will be advised at time of booking • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply • Min/max stays apply • Twin share is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • Family share is based on 2 Adults and 2 Children (ages 4-13 years) • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Cancellation fees apply 30 days prior to travel. Inclusions are subject to change based on supplier operational capabilities. Car hire is with Europcar Australia, pick up/drop off Sydney Airport and subject to dynamic availability. Vehicle excess conditions will apply. Inclusions are subject to change based on supplier operational capabilities. • Packages are subject to availability • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
